results.title: An injectable vitreous substitute with sustained release of metformin for enhanced uveal melanoma immunotherapy.
results.text_hl: Here, a novel strategy based on an injectable vitreous substitute with sustained @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ release ability (IVS-Met) was reported for efficient @DISEASE_Uveal_melanoma @DISEASE_MESH:C536494 @@@UM@@@ therapy as well as for repairing @<m>DISEASE_Vitreous_Hemorrhage</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D014823 @@@vitreous deficiency@@@ and preserving visual function.

citations.NLM: Yang M, Li J, Liu Z, Zhang H, Liu J, Liu Y, Zhuang A, Zhou H, Gu P, Fan X. An injectable vitreous substitute with sustained release of metformin for enhanced uveal melanoma immunotherapy. Biomater Sci. 2022 Dec 6;10(24):7077-7092. PMID: 36326609
